rtp.poAutSelTxt: <sup>*</sup>0 = Port automatically selected within the port range specified above.
rtp.poAlrtEvenAlrt: Invalid port number. Enter an even value between 1024 and 65534.
rtp.poAlrtOddAlrt: Invalid port number. Enter an odd value between 1025 and 65535.
rtp.plSpInAlrt: Address field is empty. Please enter a valid Multicast address.
rtp.vaFInAlrt: Video address format is invalid. Please enter a valid (ipv4, ipv6 or hostname) Multicast address.
rtp.invPortAlert: Invalid port number. Enter 0 or an even value between 1024 and 65534.
rtp.invTTLAlert: Invalid 'Time to live' value. Enter a value between 1 and 255.
rtp.aaFInAlrt: Invalid Audio address format. Please enter a valid (ipv4, ipv6 or hostname) Multicast address.
rtp.collPortAlert: Invalid port number. The video and audio port cannot be the same.
rtp.globAudioDisAlrt: Audio is currently disabled under Video Stream Settings. Enabling Always Multicast Audio will enable audio. Do you want to continue?
rtp.po3Alrt: The value for the end port must be greater than for the start port by at least three, e.g. 50000 and 50003.
rtp.po1Alrt: The value for the end port must be greater than for the start port by at least one, e.g. 50000 and 50001.
